modName: Riley The Husky - Simple Dog Follower
summary: A very simple Husky Follower, Requires Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
Riley is a husky companion found a Deep Folk Crossing, my personal favourite area in the game.

I plan on updating Riley with a nearby skeleton holding a note with a little bit of backstory but until then Riley is just a normal dog follower.

this is my first ever mod so I decided to start with something simple like a follower.

He is exactly the same as Meeko except a Husky and Essential which means he SHOULD be 100% compatible with any follower mod such as UFO or My home is your home.

Thanks for checking out my first mod and be sure to endorse if you like it!

-Bradley/Mr Bwabbers
author: Mr Bwabbers
